job_history.work_description: Prepare financial statements for presentation to the Treasurer of the Board of Directors, Finance Committee, and senior staff. Liaison to external auditors. Prepare and analyze audit schedules. Review of audited financial statements and 990 Information return for accuracy and reconciliation to the trial balance.

Prepared and analyzed the financial statements for monthly presentation to Senior Management, the Finance Committee of the Board of Directors, and the Board of Directors. Monitored overall financial compliance and reporting with Federal, State, Local agencies.

Prepared and analyzed general ledger, including cost centers, in compliance with Federal, State and grant funding requirements. Prepared financial statements for presentation to the Finance Committee of the Board of Directors.
Prepared monthly endowment investment performance and allocation report for Investment Committee and Chief Financial Officer using BNY Mellon Analytical Solutions and Excel worksheets.

Provided financial analysis of investments of $72M including the reconciliation of trust operating system to investment managers, valuation of common investment funds, and reconciliation of customer accounts.

education.university: SOUTHERN NEW HAMPSHIRE UNIVERSITY (New Hampshire College Graduate School of Business)
SOUTHERN NEW HAMPSHIRE UNIVERSITY (New Hampshire College)

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in preparing and analyzing financial statements, including general ledger, cost centers, and investment performance, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has prepared financial statements for presentation to various stakeholders, including the Board of Directors, Finance Committee, and senior staff, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Compliance
skills.explanation: Has monitored overall financial compliance and reporting with Federal, State, and Local agencies, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Investment Analysis
skills.explanation: Has prepared monthly endowment investment performance and allocation reports, and provided financial analysis of investments, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Has used Excel worksheets for preparing financial reports and investment performance analysis, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held various leadership roles, including Director of Finance and Chief Financial Officer, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Has prepared financial statements and reports, but there is limited evidence of long-term financial planning, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has prepared general ledger and cost centers, but there is limited evidence of extensive accounting experience, showing solid working proficiency.
